project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python script that generates a random password, which includes uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters with a user-configurable length.

task.name: Implement functionality to generate a random password
Allow user to configure the password length
Implement selection of character types (uppercase, lowercase, numbers, special characters)
Implement the overall password generation logic
Write tests for the password generation functionality, including tests for length and character types
Execute tests to ensure password generation works correctly
